title: Patxi's Chicago Pizza - Hayes Valley
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. One of several locations in the greater Bay Area. Chicago style deep dish as well as thin crust pizzas. Has a vegan pizza listed on the menu using Daiya cheese, or create your own pizza with choice of vegetable toppings. Has a few vegan appetizers. Limited delivery range.
